pkgmetadata.longdescription: Characterising and Locating Ecotones and Communities // Analytical methods to locate and characterise ecotones, ecosystems and environmental patchiness along ecological gradients. Methods are implemented for isolated sampling or for space/time series. It includes Detrended Correspondence Analysis (Hill Gauch (1980) doi:10.1007/BF00048870), fuzzy clustering (De Cceres et al. (2010) doi:10.1080/01621459.1963.10500845), biodiversity indices (Jost (2006) doi:10.1111/j.2006.0030-1299.14714.x), and network analyses (Epskamp et al. (2012) doi:10.18637/jss.v048.i04) - as well as tools to explore the number of clusters in the data. Functions to produce synthetic ecological datasets are also provided.
